thread.title: Best Buy Canada, together with actor and comedian Gerry Dee, surprise and "Dee-light" Guildwood Junior Public School with brand new technology as part of their ongoing School Tech Grants program
thread.title_full: Best Buy Canada, together with actor and comedian Gerry Dee, surprise and "Dee-light" Guildwood Junior Public School with brand new technology as part of their ongoing School Tech Grants program

title: Best Buy Canada, together with actor and comedian Gerry Dee, surprise and "Dee-light" Guildwood Junior Public School with brand new technology as part of their ongoing School Tech Grants program
text:
Pinterest Ã— Best Buy Canada together with actor and comedian Gerry Dee surprise 'Dee-light' Guildwood Junior Public School with all brand new technology, as part of their ongoing School Tech Grants program. This is one example of Best Buy Canada's commitment to supporting youth and education. Pictured with Guildwood students, from left to right are: Elliott Chun, Communications Manager, Best Buy; Ian Evans, Operations Manager, Best Buy Scarborough; Gerry Dee, Actor and Comedian; Eckleton Richards, Principal, Guildwood Junior Public School; ... TORONTO , Sept. 16, 2015 /CNW/ - Best Buy Canada, together with actor and comedian Gerry Dee , surprise and "Dee-light" Guildwood Junior Public School with brand new technology as part of their ongoing School Tech Grants program. This is one example of Best Buy Canada's commitment to supporting youth and education. Pictured with Guildwood students, from left to right are: Elliott Chun , Communications Manager, Best Buy Canada Ian Evans , Operations Manager, Best Buy Scarborough Gerry Dee , Actor and ComedianEckleton Richards, Principal, Guildwood Junior Public School Sanjeev Chandna , General Manager, Best Buy Scarborough SOURCE Best Buy Canada 
Image with caption: "Best Buy Canada together with actor and comedian Gerry Dee surprise 'Dee-light' Guildwood Junior Public School with all brand new technology, as part of their ongoing School Tech Grants program. This is one example of Best Buy Canada's commitment to supporting youth and education. Pictured with Guildwood students, from left to right are: Elliott Chun, Communications Manager, Best Buy; Ian Evans, Operations Manager, Best Buy Scarborough; Gerry Dee, Actor and Comedian; Eckleton Richards, Principal, Guildwood Junior Public School; Sanjeev Chandna, General Manager, Best Buy Scarborough (Photographer: Shan Qiao) (CNW Group/Best Buy Canada)". Image available at: http://photos.newswire.ca/images/download/20150916_C6995_PHOTO_EN_498704.jpg Release contains wide tables.
